name: The Magic Circle
summary: In this darkly comedic story, you are the hero of an unfinished fantasy game, and your designers have failed you. Steal the power of a game god - trap their creations, swap behaviors and body parts, crafting your own unique solutions to free-form puzzles. Can you release a game ...from the inside?
info:
• 中文名: 魔法阵
  • 别名: 魔法圈
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2015年7月9日
  • 官方网站: http://www.magiccirclegame.com/
